Exclusive: Russia's Putin to visit China in May - sourcesRussian President Vladimir Putin will travel to China in May for talks with Xi Jinping, in what could be the Kremlin chief's first overseas trip of his new presidential term, according to five sources familiar with the matter. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 08:45:33 GMT IOVATI4BY5LPJBASAQSGDLUZOA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-putin-visits-china-may-sources-2024-03-19/Laurie Chen, Yew Lun Tian, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Russia government becoming more aggressive towards Olympic movement, Bach saysRussia's government is becoming increasingly aggressive towards the International Olympic Committee as the Paris Games draw near, IOC President Thomas Bach said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 08:44:10 GMT DE527T7PHYRIDXBZD5ZZ2QNXD3M https://www.reuters.com/sports/ Russian-government-becoming-more-aggressive-towards-olympic-movement-bach-says-2024-03-19/Reuters运动的
India calls China defence ministry's claims over Arunachal Pradesh state 'absurd'India's foreign ministry said on Tuesday the Chinese defence ministry was advancing "absurd claims" over the territory of India's northeastern state of Arunachal Pradesh which it said will always be an "integral and inalienable part of India". Tue, 19 Mar 2024 08:30:34 GMT H4S3I2SWOBMTTCPGYXKDZV5GJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/india-calls-china-defence-ministry-claims-over-arunachal-pradesh-state-absurd-2024-03-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Japan saw record 2.79 mln visitors in February due to Lunar New Year boostJapan welcomed 2.79 million visitors in February, a record for the month and the most for any month since the COVID-19 pandemic began, boosted by travel during Lunar New Year holidays. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 08:18:24 GMT DBTFIT2IZNI4TJYCQCMLRFNNOI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-saw-record-279-mln-visitors-february-due-lunar-new-year-boost-2024-03-19/Rocky Swift世界亚太地区
Prosecutors seek death sentence for mastermind of Vietnam's largest financial scamVietnamese prosecutors on Tuesday called for a death sentence for Truong My Lan, the mastermind of the country's largest financial fraud case on record, state media reported. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 07:59:41 GMT INKHWOIKW5KE3GGWRZ3ZKHO23M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/prosecutors-seek-death-sentence-mastermind-vietnam-largest-financial-scam-2024-03-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Britain's deputy PM defends Israel but calls for 'immediate ceasefire' in GazaBritain's deputy prime minister defended on Tuesday Israel's right to protect itself amid growing tension between the Middle Eastern country and its biggest backers, but called for an "immediate ceasefire" in Gaza on humanitarian grounds. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 07:16:35 GMT XWS54PSBZZLADE4AFRRGBKUHK4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/britains-deputy-pm-defends-israel-calls-for-immediate-ceasefire-in-gaza-2024-03-19/Josh Smith世界中东地区
Many hospitals in China stop newborn delivery services as birth rate dropsMany hospitals in China have stopped offering newborn delivery services this year, state-backed news outlet Daily Economic News reported, with industry experts warning of an "obstetric winter" due to declining demand amid a record drop in new births. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 07:00:21 GMT IQM4DCAMENMR7EEQ5KZRK7JX3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/china/many-hospitals-china-stop-newborn-delivery-services-birth-rate-drops-2024-03-19/Reuters世界中国
Armenia's PM says he must return disputed areas to Azerbaijan or face war -TASSArmenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan said that Armenia may face a war with Azerbaijan if it does not compromise with Baku on returning some strategic Azerbaijani territories that Armenia has controlled since the early 1990s. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:53:27 GMT VHDOYNB2RZK7TH53ZGRH4MOWHU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/armenia-pm-says-he-must-return-disputed-areas-azerbaijan-or-face-war-tass-2024-03-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Killing of teen in China puts 'left behind' children of migrant workers in spotlightThe killing of a 13-year old boy in northern China last week, for which three boys are in police custody, has triggered a heated discussion in the media on juvenile crime and the plight of children left at home by migrant workers. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:52:15 GMT 2OOWIMH4XNIA5B4RCQ44ECPDUU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/killing-teen-china-puts-left-behind-children-migrant-workers-spotlight-2024-03-19/Bernard Orr, Laurie Chen世界中国
Blinken lauds 'extraordinary' expansion of defence ties with PhilippinesU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken hailed on Tuesday a recent strengthening of defence ties with the Philippines as "extraordinary", saying they would only grow further, though Washington's expanding alliances were not aimed at China. U.S.'s Blinken to push for Gaza ceasefire on Middle East tripU. S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will visit the Middle East this week, aiming to reach a ceasefire agreement between Israel and Hamas, and secure the release of hostages held by the Palestinian militant group.
